perturbation.original_text: 1 PURPOSE OF THE AGREEMENT 1.1 The purpose of this content distribution Agreement (hereinafter "Agreement") is to set forth the terms and conditions under which plan_b may use the Content ("Content" as set forth in APPENDIX 2) owned or licensed by LICENSOR for a commercial distribution to plan_b's End Users in the territory ("Territory" as set forth in APPENDIX 2). 1.2 End User means any third Party receiving Content on a mobile device for a payment in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement for their own private and non- commercial use.
perturbation.changed_text: 1 PURPOSE OF THE AGREEMENT 1.1 The purpose of this content distribution Agreement (hereinafter "Agreement") is to set forth the terms and conditions under which plan_b may use the Content owned or licensed by LICENSOR for a commercial distribution to plan_b's End Users in the territory. 1.2 End User means any third Party receiving Content on a mobile device for a payment in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement for their own private and non- commercial use.
perturbation.explanation: The clause "Content" as set forth in APPENDIX 2) owned or licensed by LICENSOR for a commercial distribution to plan_b's End Users in the territory ("Territory" as set forth in APPENDIX 2) has been omitted, the section no longer refers to Appendix 2 for the definition of content, but the rest of the document still makes reference to the appendix.

perturbation.original_text: 4 REVENUES 4.1 plan_b shall pay LICENSOR a share of its revenues as set forth in APPENDIX 2 ("REVENUES"). 4.2 All shares are net, plus the respective applying value added tax (if applicable).
perturbation.changed_text: 4 REVENUES 4.1 plan_b shall pay LICENSOR a share of its revenues. 4.2 All shares are net, plus the respective applying value added tax (if applicable).
perturbation.explanation: The phrase 'as set forth in APPENDIX 2 ("REVENUES")' has been removed. This omission creates an internal contradiction because the contract refers to revenue sharing but no longer directly links it to a specific appendix. This means the precise revenue split is no longer clearly defined, creating uncertainty even though the document references it.

perturbation.original_text: 7.5 After termination of this contract, there shall be a sell-off period (defined in APPENDIX 2) following the date of termination of this contract.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.5 After termination of this contract, there shall be a sell-off period following the date of termination of this contract.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase '(defined in APPENDIX 2)' has been removed. This omission creates an internal contradiction because the contract refers to sell-off period but no longer directly links it to a specific appendix. This means the length of sell-off period is no longer clearly defined, creating uncertainty even though the document references it.
